00013 #error "Single-threaded COM objects are not properly supported on Windows CE platform, such as the Windows Mobile platforms that do not include full DCOM support. Define _CE_ALLOW_SINGLE_THREADED_OBJECTS_IN_MTA to force ATL to support creating single-thread COM object's and allow use of it's single-threaded COM object implementations. The threading model in your rgs file was set to 'Free' as that is the only threading model supported in non DCOM Windows CE platforms."

00018 inline CString ExpMangle(CString classname) 
00019 {
00020   if(classname.GetAt(0)==_T('E'))
00021     return classname; 
00022   return StrFormat(_T("E%s") ,(const TCHAR *) classname); 
00023 }
00024 inline CString ExpDemangle(CString classname) 
00025 {
00026   // remove leading selection classname type
00027   if(classname.GetAt(0)==_T('_')) 
00028     classname=classname.Mid(1);
00029 
00030   if(classname.GetAt(0)==_T('E'))
00031     classname=classname.Mid(1); 
00032   
00033   classname.MakeLower();
00034 
00035   return classname;
00036 }
00037 
00038 class ISymbolBase :
00039   public ISmartPointer<ISymbolBase> 
00040 {
00041 public:
00042 
00043   ISymbolBase(): m_bVisited(0), m_eType( nulltype_), m_eListType(unknown_), m_nDimension(0) {}
00044   virtual ~ISymbolBase() {}
00045 
00046   CString & Name() { return m_sName; }
00047   CString & Namespace() { return m_sNamespace; }
00048   CString & Classname() { return m_sClassname; }
00049   CString   ExpressClassname() { return ExpDemangle(Classname()); }
00050   CString & ListClassname() { return m_sListClassname; }
00051   CString   ExpressListClassname() { return ExpDemangle(m_sListClassname); }
00052 
00053   StepNodeType & Type () { return m_eType; }
00054   StepNodeType & ListType () { return m_eListType; }
00055 
00056   bool IsASimpleListType(StepNodeType _eType ) 
00057   {
00058     return (_eType==integer_ || _eType==real_ || _eType == number_ || _eType == boolean_ || _eType == logical_ || _eType==string_ || _eType==enumeration_); 
00059   }
00060 
00061   bool IsSimpleType() 
00062   {
00063     return (m_eType==integer_ || m_eType==real_ || m_eType == number_ || m_eType == boolean_ || m_eType == logical_ || m_eType==string_ || m_eType==enumeration_); 
00064   }
00065   bool IsListType() { return Type()== list_ || Type()== set_ || Type()== aggregate_ || Type()== array_ || Type()== bag_; }
00066   bool IsSimpleListType();
00067   int GetVisited() { return m_bVisited; }
00068   void SetVisited(int bval) { m_bVisited = (int) bval; }
00069   int & Dimension() { return m_nDimension; }
00071   CString m_sName;
00072   CString m_sNamespace;
00073   CString m_sClassname;
00074   CString m_sListClassname;
00075   CString m_sFile;
00076   int m_nLine;
00077   StepNodeType m_eType;
00078 
00079   StepNodeType m_eListType;
00080   int m_nDimension;
00081   std::vector<int> m_vLowerBounds;
00082   std::vector<int> m_vUpperBounds;
00083 
00084   int m_bVisited;
00085   // vs IExpress * _parent; //???
00086 
00087 
00088 };
00089 EXP_DECLARE_SMARTPOINTER(ISymbolBase);
